## Public Member Functions

### final() {#a0edd40c15db0945689a7bccef81dbb40}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::array&lt; uint8&#95;t, 32 &gt; llvm::SHA256::final ()</>}>
Return the current raw 256-bits <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha256">SHA256</a> for the digested data since the last call to <a href="#a04258411fa38df1f7ebfb371ceb3654e">init()</a>.

This call will add data to the internal state and as such is not suited for getting an intermediate result (see <a href="#a8ac286c9418760c89bbe7ae6d19a453c">result()</a>).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha256-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha256-h">SHA256.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha256-cpp/#l00258">258</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha256-cpp">SHA256.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### init() {#a04258411fa38df1f7ebfb371ceb3654e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::SHA256::init ()">
Reinitialize the internal state.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha256-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha256-h">SHA256.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha256-cpp/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha256-cpp">SHA256.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### result() {#a8ac286c9418760c89bbe7ae6d19a453c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::array&lt; uint8&#95;t, 32 &gt; llvm::SHA256::result ()</>}>
Return the current raw 256-bits <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha256">SHA256</a> for the digested data since the last call to <a href="#a04258411fa38df1f7ebfb371ceb3654e">init()</a>.

This is suitable for getting the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha256">SHA256</a> at any time without invalidating the internal state so that more calls can be made into update.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha256-h/#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha256-h">SHA256.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha256-cpp/#l00268">268</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha256-cpp">SHA256.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### update() {#a8085b46c447eb45cf02de25f782e97a6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::SHA256::update (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}>
